definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Being in class with the opposite sex can also take attention away from learning.
sentences.chinese: 與異性同班還會分散學習的注意力。

sentences.english: Schools break up every summer for holiday.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天學校都會散學放暑假。
